Strudel Wags PoC

From the developers console, you can instantiate a new poc context by running var myCtx = poc(). Then, the API is as follows:

  • myCtx.start() : start the engine.
  • myCtx.stop() : stop the engine.
  • myCtx.clen(3.1416) : change the cycle length to 3.1416. Note that, to take effect, this must be followed by
  • myCtx.pat(mini("60 [62 64]")) : change the pattern. Anything that's not an integer will default to some random note.

Have fun!
